title: About
content: Hate speech is a controversial and debated phenomenon, as it lies in a complex nexus with free speech and the respect for equality, liberty and dignity of every human being.

We tried to follow a possible path that a user could take in order to get information and form an opinion about hate speech, trying to map the controversial debate that the Hate Speech term generates: is it filtering? Or is it censorship?

title: Team
content: Francesca Brotto, Nicola Brignoli, Lea Fabiano, Elena Filippi, Edoardo Guido, Jacopo Poletto.
